mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select a.emp_commute_ix,a.emp_ix,a.worktime,a.leavetime,a.workday,a.daytime,a.state,b.emp_change_ix,b.c_worktime,b.c_leavetime,b.title,b.reason,b.progress,b.c_return from emp_commute_tb a,emp_change_tb b where a.emp_commute_ix=b.emp_commute_ix)a)b where rnum>=((#{cp}-1)*#{listsize}+1) and emp_ix=#{emp_ix} and rnum<=#{cp}*#{listsize}
select count(emp_ix) as total from emp_commute_tb
select count(emp_commute_ix) as total from emp_commute_tb where workday=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')

select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select e.emp_ix,e.e_name,e.e_position,ecom.worktime,ecom.leavetime,ecom.state from emp_tb e, emp_commute_tb ecom where e.emp_ix=ecom.emp_ix and e.man_ix=#{man_ix} and ecom.workday=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'))a)b where rnum>=((#{cp}-1)*#{listsize}+1) and rnum<=#{cp}*#{listsize}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select e.emp_ix, e.e_name, ecom.worktime,ecom.leavetime,ecom.workday,ecom.emp_commute_ix, ech.emp_change_ix,ech.c_worktime,ech.c_leavetime,ech.title, ech.reason,ech.progress,ech.c_return from emp_tb e, emp_commute_tb ecom, emp_change_tb ech where ech.emp_ix = e.emp_ix and ech.emp_commute_ix = ecom.emp_commute_ix and e.man_ix=#{man_ix} order by emp_change_ix desc)a)b where rnum>=((#{cp}-1)*#{listsize}+1) and rnum<=#{cp}*#{listsize}
select count(emp_change_ix) as total from emp_change_tb order by emp_change_ix desc
